about_the_game:
Collection Content: Super DLC Collection=Military God Mind Technique Gift Pack DLC+Imperial Emperor Yao Set Gift Pack DLC+Unmatched National Scholars Gift Pack DLC+Divine Secret Technique Gift Pack DLC+Divine Dragon Heavenly Emperor Gift Pack DLC
This collection contains DLC content for all props, except for the Heroes of the World gift pack. If you have already purchased all DLC gift packs and want to purchase them again, or if you are a new player and find it difficult to purchase DLCs one by one, simply purchase this collection gift pack.
Finally, as a gesture of gratitude, the game author will give you an additional gift as a token of appreciation
Epic level stunt book: [Breaking Shield] One book (ignoring enemy Force shields)+Super Buff stunt book: Automatic Dominance
And a large amount of consumables: Supreme Hundred Pills Banquet * 1=Supreme Lion Awakening Pills * 20, Essence Cod Fish Pills * 20, Jinba Brown Bear Pills * 20, Breeze Cheetah Pills * 20, Refined Sea Dog Pills * 20
This gift pack has an actual value of over 8888 yuan, with the highlight of ignoring enemy Force Shield special skill books and DLC secondary purchases, helping to harvest nightmare difficulty in all levels.
Customer service QQ: 392788593 Customer service QQ email: 392788593@qq.com
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
detailed_description:
Collection Content: Super DLC Collection=Military God Mind Technique Gift Pack DLC+Imperial Emperor Yao Set Gift Pack DLC+Unmatched National Scholars Gift Pack DLC+Divine Secret Technique Gift Pack DLC+Divine Dragon Heavenly Emperor Gift Pack DLC
This collection contains DLC content for all props, except for the Heroes of the World gift pack. If you have already purchased all DLC gift packs and want to purchase them again, or if you are a new player and find it difficult to purchase DLCs one by one, simply purchase this collection gift pack.
Finally, as a gesture of gratitude, the game author will give you an additional gift as a token of appreciation
Epic level stunt book: [Breaking Shield] One book (ignoring enemy Force shields)+Super Buff stunt book: Automatic Dominance
And a large amount of consumables: Supreme Hundred Pills Banquet * 1=Supreme Lion Awakening Pills * 20, Essence Cod Fish Pills * 20, Jinba Brown Bear Pills * 20, Breeze Cheetah Pills * 20, Refined Sea Dog Pills * 20
This gift pack has an actual value of over 8888 yuan, with the highlight of ignoring enemy Force Shield special skill books and DLC secondary purchases, helping to harvest nightmare difficulty in all levels.
Customer service QQ: 392788593 Customer service QQ email: 392788593@qq.com
Note: If you have purchased but have not claimed this DLC, please enter the "Start Game" interface of Steam Han Wu Emperor Zhuan. There is a "Manage My DLC" in the lower right corner of the interface. Remove all other checkmarks and only keep the hook for this DLC and the content addition package DLC to enter the game and claim it. After receiving it, check the other DLCs. Only one operation is required, and once successful, all archives will be permanently valid.
